tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doc wishi is friendly and does her job effectively to ensure we hardly feel any pain during root canal treatment.
I surely recommend her

tags: None
review: Very skilled doctor & does a thorough job with proper explanations at each stage of the treatment. Clinic is also very clean & hygenic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Really happy with the overall treatment and advice from all doctor s involved in my RCT. I had given up on my tooth and even requested the doc to extract my tooth to get rid of the immense pain. But doctor suggested me to keep patience and they will treat my teeth and save it. My treatment was done in an excellent manner no haste at all in just finishing the job but they treated the infection so well and now I am feeling much better and would like to thank all the doc s involved ...you have done an excellent job...I would and infact have already recommended this clinic to all I know....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited clinic for the treatment of root canal. Dr Wishi handle my case. She was very friendly and supportive throughout my case. She explained the issue and every step Patiencely. Whenever I need her she was just a phone away.I am very satisfied with my treatment under Dr. Wishi. She is now my family dental doctor.

tags: None
review: I went there for tooth feeling but the doctor  was literally  forcing us to extract the wisdom tooth and they took the xray ***** *** *** ** *** ******** *** charged 200 rs per tooth. **** *** ****** ** ***** *** ***** *** not listing to anyone else.  At the reception  I was trying to show my booking which was done through practo but she wasn't  interested and just asked me to fill the form and this created  confusion  later.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dentokraft for a dental treatment and was fortunate enough to be treated by Dr.  Wishi. Very friendly and supportive throughout the treatment!  Saved not one but 2 teeth which required root canal treatment. I was on the verge of deciding on dental extraction but thanks to Dr.  Wishi for advising on a RCT.  Highly recommended for Dental treatment!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had gone with my son to get his wobbly tooth examined. The advice given, and the cool and calm demeanor of Dr Wishi made my son calm and cooperate with the procedure of the extract!! I am very impressed with the through professionalism and the warmth, the friendly and caring nature towards children!! 
The best clinic  that I have visited in Mira Road!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Wishi is a thorough professional at the same time very friendly person. She made sure that I was comfortable throughout the procedure. It was a painless root canal treatment. Excelleny job, I'm no more scared of dental visits :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Wishi was extremely helpful and friendly. She was comprehensive at explaining what was exactly wrong with my tooth and how it was creating an impact. She helped me go through the entire extraction process smoothly. She does not rush through with her patients, she lets them take as long as it takes to get comfortable. It was a painless procedure and all the medications and after-care were properly explained as well as sent over on the phone as an additional reminder. I am really happy with my experience at Dento Kraft.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had an appointment with Dr.Wishi regarding root canal.I was facing tooth pain since month and then through reference I got to know about Dr.Wishi.Through out the treatment I was very comfortable and satisfied.Initially I was scared but due to doctor's friendliness all goes well.
She also explained the reasons and further precautions which need to be take care after treatment.
She corporate with my sitting dates and just a call away if any issue I faced.
Over all I experienced nice time while treatment.
